channel.title: [PI] Adding a ::maxhit command
channel.description: Hey everyone! I just wanted some help on adding a ::maxhit command. What the command does, the gear you're wearing it will tell you what the max hit is in that. Then if you change gear, what the max hit is in that etc. :) Thanks very much in advance.
